Overview:
Japan Space Systems functions as an industry representative group consisting of member companies mainly from the Japanese space sector. It carries out research and development, human resources development and business promotion activities creating business opportunities in the sector. 

Comprised of staff with experience in government agencies, national research institutes and other major aerospace corporations and its member companies, which gives it a unique and wide network among the Japanese Space industry.
